The assigned setup security segment.

Eligibility Rules establish who is eligible for this compensation component.  If you select multiple eligibility rules, Workday evaluates each rule independently to determine employee eligibility for the compensation component. Employees are eligible if they meet the qualifications of any one rule.

Description.description: Attribute used to describe a one-time payment plan.

Effective_Date.description: The effective date of the one-time payment plan.  It is recommended to use 1900-01-01.

Eligibility_Rule_Reference.description: Eligibility Rules establish who is eligible for this compensation component.  If you select multiple eligibility rules, Workday evaluates each rule independently to determine employee eligibility for the compensation component. Employees are eligible if they meet the qualifications of any one rule.

Frequency_Reference_Frequency_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Frequency_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Inactive.description: Inactive status indicator for one-time payment plans.

Include_Inactive_Prompt.description: Include Inactive indicates the response will also include inactive One-Time Payment Plans.

Maximum_Amount.description: Maximum amount for one-time payment plan.

Maximum_Percent.description: Maximum percent for one-time payment plan.

Minimum_Amount.description: Minimum amount for one-time payment plan.

Minimum_Percent.description: Minimum percent for one-time payment plan.

One-Time_Payment_Plan_Amount_Based_Profi.description: This is a wrapper for the One-Time Payment Plan Amount Based Profile Data; this is used to display or replace One-Time Payment Plan Amount Based Profile Data.

One-Time_Payment_Plan_ID.description: Unique attribute identifying a valid instance of One-Time Payment Plan.

One-Time_Payment_Plan_Percent_Based_Prof.description: This is a wrapper for the One-Time Payment Plan Percent Based Profile Data; this is used to display or replace One-Time Payment Plan Percent Based Profile Data.

Percent_Compensation_Element_Reference_W.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Percent_Worktags_Reference.description: The worktags associated with this one-time payment.

Plan_Name.description: Unique attribute identifying a valid instance of One-Time Payment Plan.

Schedule_Reference_One-Time_Payment_Plan.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Schedule_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Target_Amount.description: Amount to pay to the employee as a one-time payment.

Target_Percent.description: Percent used to calculate the payment amount.

Use_Coverage_Dates.description: Indicator for whether or not to Use Coverage Dates.

Worker_Selectable.description: Indicator for whether workers can select this plan when requesting a one-time payment for themselves.
